# Implementation Plan: Landing Page (Marketing + SEO)

**Branch**: `012-landing-page` | **Date**: 2025-12-01 | **Spec**: [spec.md](./spec.md)
**Input**: Feature specification from `/specs/012-landing-page/spec.md`

**Note**: This plan was generated by `/speckit.plan` command. Phase 0/1 artifacts already exist from prior planning session.

## Summary

Implement a marketing landing page for VoidPay that communicates the stateless, privacy-first crypto invoicing value proposition. The page includes:
- Hero section with animated headline (AuroraText), CTAs, and network trust signals
- Interactive demo section with auto-rotating InvoicePaper across 4 networks (10s interval)
- Feature sections: "How It Works" (3 steps) and "Why VoidPay?" (6 cards)
- Footer CTA section with gradient background
- Full SEO metadata via Next.js Metadata API
- WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility (reduced motion, keyboard navigation, semantic HTML)

**Technical Approach**: Compose 5 FSD widgets in `widgets/landing/` using existing shared/ui components. Static content with minimal client-side state (demo rotation only). Server-rendered for SEO.

## Technical Context

**Language/Version**: TypeScript 5+, React 19+, Next.js 15+
**Primary Dependencies**: Framer Motion (animation), Tailwind CSS 4+ (styling), lucide-react (icons)
**Storage**: N/A (no persistence required - pure presentation)
**Testing**: Vitest + React Testing Library, 80%+ coverage target
**Target Platform**: Web (modern browsers: Chrome 120+, Firefox 120+, Safari 17+, Edge 120+)
**Project Type**: Web application (Next.js App Router)
**Performance Goals**: Lighthouse 85+ Performance, 90+ SEO, 95+ Accessibility
**Constraints**:
- Hero visible in <2s on 3G throttling
- CLS < 0.1 during demo rotation
- All animations respect `prefers-reduced-motion`
**Scale/Scope**: Single page, 5 widgets, ~56 test cases

### Source Code (FSD Structure)

```text
src/
├── app/
│   └── page.tsx                    # Landing page composition + SEO metadata
│
├── widgets/
│   └── landing/                    # Feature widgets
│       ├── index.ts                # Public API
│       ├── types.ts                # Shared types
│       │
│       ├── hero-section/           # Hero with headline, CTAs, badges
│       │   ├── HeroSection.tsx
│       │   ├── index.ts
│       │   └── __tests__/
│       │
│       ├── how-it-works/           # 3-step workflow section
│       │   ├── HowItWorks.tsx
│       │   ├── StepCard.tsx
│       │   ├── index.ts
│       │   └── __tests__/
│       │
│       ├── why-voidpay/            # 6-card feature grid
│       │   ├── WhyVoidPay.tsx
│       │   ├── FeatureCard.tsx
│       │   ├── index.ts
│       │   └── __tests__/
│       │
│       ├── demo-section/           # Rotating invoice demo
│       │   ├── DemoSection.tsx
│       │   ├── index.ts
│       │   └── __tests__/
│       │
│       ├── footer-cta/             # Final CTA section
│       │   ├── FooterCta.tsx
│       │   ├── index.ts
│       │   └── __tests__/
│       │
│       ├── hooks/                  # Widget-level hooks
│       │   ├── use-interval.ts
│       │   └── use-demo-rotation.ts
│       │
│       └── constants/              # Static content
│           ├── demo-invoices.ts
│           ├── features.ts
│           └── workflow-steps.ts
│
└── shared/
    └── ui/                         # Reused from sharedUiIndex
        ├── aurora-text/
        ├── hyper-text/
        ├── button/
        ├── card/
        ├── typography/
        ├── motion/
        └── hooks/use-reduced-motion.ts
```

**Structure Decision**: FSD-compliant widget layer. All widgets in `widgets/landing/` import only from `shared/ui` (leaf layer). No feature layer dependencies for landing page.

## Implementation Phases

### Phase 0: Research (COMPLETE)

See [research.md](./research.md) for decisions on:
- R1: Static InvoicePaper display (no 3D transforms)
- R2: Demo invoice rotation with useInterval
- R3: SEO via Next.js Metadata API
- R4: Reduced motion via existing useReducedMotion hook
- R5: Network trust signals as inline SVG
- R6: Feature grid with CSS Grid

### Phase 1: Design (COMPLETE)

See [data-model.md](./data-model.md) for:
- FeatureCard, WorkflowStep, DemoInvoice types
- Component props interfaces
- Entity relationships diagram
- Validation rules

See [quickstart.md](./quickstart.md) for:
- Development workflow
- TDD patterns
- Component reuse checklist
- Validation commands

See [contracts/README.md](./contracts/README.md) for:
- Documentation that no API endpoints are required

Run `/speckit.tasks` to generate tasks.md with:

| Component | Import | Usage |
|-----------|--------|-------|
| `AuroraText` | `@/shared/ui/aurora-text` | Hero headline gradient animation |
| `HyperText` | `@/shared/ui/hyper-text` | Tagline scramble effect |
| `Button` | `@/shared/ui/button` | CTAs (void, outline variants) |
| `Card` | `@/shared/ui/card` | Feature cards (glass variant) |
| `Heading` | `@/shared/ui/typography` | Section headings |
| `Text` | `@/shared/ui/typography` | Body text |
| `motion` | `@/shared/ui/motion` | Framer Motion wrapper |
| `useReducedMotion` | `@/shared/ui/hooks/use-reduced-motion` | Accessibility hook |
